mapper.select: select memname, memnum, memprofile, memjob, memauth, memmail, meminmail, memdept from member where memmgr=#{memmgr}

select tonum, to_char(tostdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') tostdate, to_char(toendate,'yyyy-mm-dd') toendate, totitle, tocont, tofile, todept, tomem, toconfirm, tocomm from todo where toconfirm = 'n' and tomem=#{tomem} order by 1 desc
mapper.update: update todo set toconfirm='y', tocomm=#{tocomm} where tonum=#{tonum}
update todo set toconfirm='z', tocomm=#{tocomm} where tonum=#{tonum}
update todo set toconfirm='o', tocomm=#{tocomm} where tonum=#{tonum}
mapper.select: select rownum torownum, tonum,to_char(tostdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') tostdate,to_char(toendate,'yyyy-MM-dd') toendate,nvl(totitle,'제목없음') totitle,tocont,tomem,tocomm,toconfirm from (select * from todo where todept=(select memdept from member where memnum=#{tomem}) order by toconfirm desc, 1 desc)
mapper.update: update todo set toconfirm=?, tomem=?,tocomm=? where tonum=?
mapper.select: select tonum, to_char(tostdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') tostdate, to_char(toendate,'yyyy-mm-dd') toendate, totitle, tocont, tofile, todept, tomem, toconfirm, tocomm from todo where todept=#{memdept}

select t.tonum, to_char(t.tostdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') tostdate, to_char(t.toendate,'yyyy-mm-dd') toendate, t.totitle, t.tocont, t.tofile, t.todept, t.tomem, t.toconfirm, t.tocomm, m.memname from todo t, member m where t.tomem = m.memnum and t.tomem=#{memnum} and t.toconfirm='y' order by 1 desc
select j.jobnum, m.memname, m.memprofile, j.jobcont from todojob j, member m where m.memnum = j.jobmemnum and j.jobtonum=#{jobtonum} order by 1 desc

select t.tonum, to_char(t.tostdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') tostdate, to_char(t.toendate,'yyyy-mm-dd') toendate, t.totitle, t.tocont, t.tofile, t.todept, t.tomem, t.toconfirm, t.tocomm,m.memname from todo t, member m where t.tomem = m.memnum and t.todept=#{todept} and t.toconfirm='y' order by 1 desc

select t.tonum, to_char(t.tostdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') tostdate, to_char(t.toendate,'yyyy-mm-dd') toendate, t.totitle, t.tocont, t.tofile, t.todept, t.tomem, t.toconfirm, t.tocomm,m.memname from todo t, member m where t.tomem = m.memnum and t.toconfirm='y' and (m.memnum = #{memmgr} or m.memmgr = #{memmgr}) order by 1 desc
